featured.text: The forces that are crushing individual lives and futures are also destroying the prospects for an entire region. 49.
With more than 13 million children already driven from classrooms by conflict, it is no exaggeration to say that the educational prospects of a generation of children are in the balance.

definition.en_def: The possibility or likelihood of some future event occurring.
definition.example: The prospect of a promotion motivated her to work harder.
